it.polimi.se2018.model

Class WindowCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.WindowCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class WindowCell
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    WindowCell class represents the cell, *one square*, of the window grid. Each cell can be assigned with a die.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
